dict.acceptation: 物理学；物理现象；物理成分；

sent.orig: Basic physics experiments, modern physics experiment, integrated physics experiment.
sent.trans: 基础物理实验，近代物理实验，综合物理实验。

sent.orig: Backgrounds of Physics, Mathematics, Solid-State Physics, Semiconductors Devices Physics, Optoelectronics, Electromagnetic, Microwave Devices, etc.
sent.trans: 须有物理、学、态物理、导体元件物理、电元件、磁学、波工程等背景。

sent.orig: Physics concept is the foundation of physics knowledge system and the essence of physics theory.
sent.trans: 物理概念是物理知识结构的基础，是物理学理论的根基和精髓。

sent.orig: Atomic physics (or atom physics ) is physics of the electron hull of atoms.
sent.trans: 原子物理学是原子中电子云的物理学。

sent.orig: It is typical that solid state physics emphasizes how physics properties link to electronic structure.
sent.trans: 固体物理学强调典型怎样物理学特性去电子结构的连接。
